author: Jon Schuppe
title: 'It's a new world': Police get creative to stay safe and keep order as coronavirus spreads
description: The coronavirus pandemic has transformed American policing, compelling officers to drop their routines and find new ways to protect the public and themselves.
content:
Late last month, as officials in Cambridge, Massachusetts, scrambled to defend the city against the coronavirus, Patrol Officer Bob Reardon got an assignment that signaled how suddenly his job had changed.
Someone complained about a football game.
There was… [+7755 chars]
